text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The criterion requires the response to mention that owners must maintain written communication records with leaseholders confirming coordination on fire-safety measures. The candidate answer explicitly addresses the duty to cooperate and coordinate under Article 5(3) of the FSO and Regulation 11 of the MHSWR 1999. Under the 'Cooperation and Coordination' section (2.2), it states: 'Evidence of formal lease terms requiring the tenant to comply with fire safety obligations... would significantly strengthen your position' and 'Evidence of regular communication, joint fire safety reviews, or shared fire safety protocols would demonstrate compliance with Article 5(3)'. This directly addresses the need for written communication/formal arrangements between the owner and the leaseholder regarding coordination of fire safety measures.", "criterion_id": "02f07834-f847-4401-8257-70a37a9927fb"}
